column4: Why can't I get this damn usb headset to work in 9.04 whe it has worked out of box with every previous ubuntu?
did you check what via it uses for sound? ALSA, Pulseaudio or OSS? 9.04 is very inclusive with PA, and that could be the difference
tried alsa and the headset directly, both still send sound to the rear sound out
that seems bad... don't have a clue how to help there.. don't have one myself
